GSP28mjnya02u:756: yathā ' samidho yajati ' ityatra yajatipade vidhitvaṃ śrutyā pratīyate,
GSP28mjnya02u:758: anuvādatvaṃ tu purovādarūpasya ' samidho yajati' ityasya saṃnidhināvagamyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:760: vidhitve ca pūrvavākyavihitasya saminnāmakasya yāgasya punarvidhānāyogāttanūnapādādināmakāni yāgāntarāṇi vidhīyante /
GSP28mjnya02u:766: ' athaiṣa jyotiḥ ' ityasminvakṣyamāṇodāharaṇe yāgāvagaptātprāgena saṃjñātvāvagamātsaṃjñāyāḥ karmabhedahetutvam /
GSP28mjnya02u:769: bhinnānāṃ yāgānāṃ samitsaṃjñāyā anyāḥ saṃjñā apekṣitaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:774: viśeṣadarśanāc ca sarveṣāṃ sameṣu hy apravṛttiḥ syāt / Jaim_2,2.4 /
GSP28mjnya02u:776: codanā vā guṇānāṃ yugapacchāstrāc codite hi tadarthatvāt tasya tasyopadiśyeta / Jaim_2,2.6 /
GSP28mjnya02u:793: idamāmnāyate ---- ' ya evaṃ vidvānpaurṇamāsīṃ yajate ' ' ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate ' iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:795: na tu prakṛtā āgneyādayaḥ ṣaḍyāgā anūdyante /
GSP28mjnya02u:796: āgneyādayaśca kālasaṃyuktāstasminprakaraṇa evamāmnāyante - ' yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavati ' iti,
GSP28mjnya02u:808: “sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyate yaddhruvāyāmājyam“iti dhrauvasya sādhāraṇatvaṃ śrutam /
GSP28mjnya02u:810: vṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāyām“eti vārtraghnyau vṛdhanvatyau carcau krameṇa kāladvayopete karmaṇi vidhīyete /
GSP28mjnya02u:812: ' tvaṃ somāsi satpatistvaṃ rājota vṛtrahā ' ityaparaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:825: devatā tu vidhitsitasya karmāntarasya sarvathā na labhyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:827_1: krame vārtraghnyau vṛdhanvatyau cā'mnāte liṅgaṃ cāgniviṣayaṃ somaviṣayaṃ ca tatropalabhyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:833: kiṃ tarhi - pūrvaprakṛteṣvāgneyādiṣu ṣaṭsu trikarūpau dvau samudāyāvanuvadati /
GSP28mjnya02u:838: tatsiddhau ca“darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta“ityasminphalavākye ṣaḍyāgavivakṣayā dvivacananirdeśa upapadyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:842: āgneyopāṃśuyājāgnīṣomīyāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ paurṇamāsīkālavihitānāṃ sahaprayogaḥ ' porṇamāsyā ' ityanena tṛtīyaikavacanāntena vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:852: kiṃcānuvādatvamabhyupagamya karmāntaravidhiṃ vadataḥ prayojādīnāmāgneyādīnāṃ ca guṇapradhānabhāvo na sidhyet /
GSP28mjnya02u:853: tathā hi -- ' samidho yajati ' ' āghāramāghārayati ' ityādayaḥ kālayogarahitāḥ kecidvidhaya āmnātāḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:854: ' yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca ' ityādayaḥ kālayuktā apare /
GSP28mjnya02u:855: teṣāmubhayeṣāṃ prakṛtatvāt“darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta“iti vākye sarveṣāṃ phalasaṃbandho bodhanīyaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:860: sarveṣāṃ ca phalasaṃbandhe rājasūyagateṣṭipaśusomavatsamaprādhānyātprayājādīnāṃ guṇabhāvo na syāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:864: prayājādīnāṃ tu guṇabhāva iti na ko 'pi doṣaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:884: tatra viṣṇvādivākyeṣu vihitasya yāgatrayasamudāyasyānuvādaḥ- iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:888: pūrvavākye tu tatpratīyata iti vidhāyakaṃ tadvākyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:892: satyevaṃ guṇadvayaviśiṣṭakarmaṇyādyena vākyena vihite viṣṇvādivākyamarthavādaḥ syāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:895: ājāmitvena samādhānenopasaṃhārācca ' jāmi vai ' ityādeḥ ' ajāmitvāya ' ityantasya sarvasya mahāvākyasyaikatvapratīteḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:906: codanā vā śabdārthasya prayogabhūtatvāt tatsannidher guṇārthena punaḥ śrutiḥ / Jaim_2,2.16 /
GSP28mjnya02u:915: idamāmnāyate - ' agnihotraṃ juhoti ' 'dadhaṇa juhoti ' 'payasā juhoti' iti ca /
GSP28mjnya02u:922: tatra vaktavyam - kiṃ dadhyādivākyena guṇāmātraṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28mjnya02u:925: agnihotrādivākyasya tvanmate karmavidhāyakatvābhāvena guṇinaḥ kasyacidasiddhau guṇyanuvādapuraḥsarasya guṇamātravidhānasyāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:933: dravyacodanā paśusomayoḥ prakaraṇe hy anarthako dravyasaṃyogo na hi tasya guṇārthena / Jaim_2,2.17 /
GSP28mjnya02u:935: tadbhedāt karmaṇo 'bhyāso dravyapṛthaktvād anarthakaṃ hi syād bhedo dravyaguṇībhāvāt / Jaim_2,2.19 /
GSP28mjnya02u:936: saṃskāras tu na bhidyeta parārthatvād dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt / Jaim_2,2.20 /
GSP28mjnya02u:955: eteṣāṃ grahaṇavākyavihitānāṃ yāgānāṃ samudāyaḥ ' somena yajeta ' ityanenānūdyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:959: tasmāt - avadānavākyavihitānāṃ yāgānāṃ samudāyaḥ“paśumālabheta“ityanenānūdyate - iti prāpte --
GSP28mjnya02u:965: na ca - taddhitapratyayaḥ sarvanāmārthe vihitaḥ prakṛtaṃ brūte,
GSP28mjnya02u:984: rūpasya tena karmaikyaṃ saṃkhyā nātra kriyāgatā // MJaiNy_2,2.20 //
GSP28mjnya02u:989: tatra ' juhoti ' ityetadākhyātaṃ ' samidho yajati ' ityādivannābhyastam,
GSP28mjnya02u:992: tritvasaṃkhyā tu tasyaiva karmaṇa āvṛttyā netavyā /
GSP28mjnya02u:1001: iha tvetadvidhitaḥ pūrva karmaṇa ekatvasaṃkhyāvarodho nāstīti vaiṣamyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1003: karmavācina āhutiśabdasya viśeṣaṇena triśabdena karmabahutvasya sphuṭatayā pūrvapakṣānutthānāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1005: atra ' prajāpattirdevatā yeṣāṃ paśūnāṃ te prājāpatyāḥ ' iti taddhitavyutpattau bahutvopotāḥ paśava ekaṃ dravyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1011_0: brūmaḥ- atra ' prajāpatirdevatā yasya paśoḥ sa prājāpatyaḥ ' iti taddhitāntaṃ prātipadikaṃ
GSP28mjnya02u:1014: evaṃ sati ' prājāpatyaḥ ' ityanena taddhitāntaprātipadikanaikapaśudravyamekadevatopetaṃ yāgasya rūpaṃ samarpyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1025: athaiṣa jyotirityatra guṇo vā karma vā pṛthak /
GSP28mjnya02u:1034: atra prakṛtaṃ jyotiṣṭopam 'eṣa jyotiḥ ' ityanūdya tasminsahastradānalakṣaṇo guṇo vidhīyate -- iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1037: na caivaṃ sati ' ayaiṣa jyotiḥ ' ityukta etacchabdo 'nupapanna iti vācyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1040: sa ca jyotiḥ śabdo 'tī maparāmṛśannapūrvasaṃjñārūpatvānnūtanaṃ kiṃcitkarmābhidhatte /
GSP28mjnya02u:1043: viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotiḥ śabdayorapyayaṃ nyāyo draṣṭavyaḥ // MJaiNyC_2,2.22-23 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1049: guṇaḥ karmāntaraṃ vā syādvājibhyo vājinaṃ tviti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1059: tatra --- āmikṣādravyabhājo ye viśve devā uktāḥ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1063: tacca dravyamāmikṣādravyeṇa saha samuccīnatāṃ vikalpyatāṃ vā, iti prāpte --
GSP28mjnya02u:1067: aguṇe tu karmaśabde guṇas tatra pratīyeta / Jaim_2,2.24 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1085: payodadhyādīnāṃ sarveṣāmutpannaśiṣṭatayāṃ samabalatvādekaikena dravyeṇāgnihotraniṣpatteśca vrīhīyavavadvikalpaḥ // MJaiNyC_2,2.26 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1087: phalaśrutes tu karma syāt phalasya karmayogitvāt / Jaim_2,2.25 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1088: atulyatvāt tu vākyayor guṇe tasya pratīyeta / Jaim_2,2.26 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1093: guṇo vā bhidyate karma dhātvarthasya phalitvataḥ // MJaiNy_2,2.27 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1101: 'indriyakāmasya' ityaktasya phalasya dhātvartha mantareṇa dravyamātrādaniṣpatteḥ - iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1103: karmāntaravidhau 'dadhamatā homenondriyaṃ bhāvayet' iti matvarthalakṣaṇā prasaṅgāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1124_1: yajeta ' ityasya saṃnidhau śrūyate - ' etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma
GSP28mjnya02u:1127: agniṣṭomokthādīnāṃ saptānāṃ somasaṃsthānāṃ madhye 'gniṣṭomasaṃsthārūpatvāt ' agniṣṭomaḥ ' ityapyucyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1128: prakṛtau tṛtīyasavana ārbhavapavamānasyopari yajñāyajñīyaṃ sāma gīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1129: tena ca sāmnāgniṣṭomayāgasya samāpyamānatvāt ' agniṣṭomasāma ' ityucyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1130: tacca prakṛtau 'yajñāyajñā vo agnayaḥ ' ityādyāgneyīṣvṛkṣu gīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1133: paśukāmatya tu ' revatīrnaḥ sadhamādaḥ'- ityādiṣu revatīṣvakṣu vāravantīyaṃ sāma gāyet, iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1134: tatra revatīnāmṛcāṃ vāravantīyanāmakena sāmnā yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1138: yathā pūrvādhikaraṇa indriyaphalāya prakṛte 'gnihotre dadhiguṇo vihitaḥ,tadvat /
GSP28mjnya02u:1142: phalasaṃbandha eka eva śāstrabodhya iti na tatra vākyabhedaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1143: iha tu - revatyugādhārakavāravantīyasāmno 'gniṣṭutkarmasādhanatvaṃ phalasādhanatvaṃ cetyubhayasya śāstraikabodhyatvāddurvāro vākyabhedaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1148: sarvasya voktakāmatvāt tasmin kāmaśrutiḥ syān nidhanārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ / Jaim_2,2.29 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1161: ' yo vṛṣṭikāmo yo 'nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta,
GSP28mjnya02u:1162: sarve vai kāmāḥ saubhare ' iti samāmnāya punaḥ samāmnātam - hīṣita vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt,
GSP28mjnya02u:1166: nidhanaṃ nāma pañcabhiḥ saptabhirvā bhāgairupetasya sāmno 'ntimo bhāgaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1167: tasminnidhane hīṣādayo viśeṣāḥ saubharasāmasādhyastotraphalebhyo vṛṣṭyādibhyo 'nyāni vṛṣṭryādiphalāni janayituṃ vidhīyante /
GSP28mjnya02u:1172: tataḥ saubharasya hīṣitinidhanaviśeṣasya ca phalabhūte dve vṛṣṭī bhavataḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1174: brūmaḥ- saubharavidhau yo vṛṣṭyādikāmaḥ sa eva hīṣādividhau pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1179: hīṣādīnāṃ ca nānāśākhādhyayanādeva saubhare prāptatvādanarthako 'yaṃ vidhiḥ- iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1181: phalatrayakāmāṇāṃ trayāṇāmaniyamenaiva hīṣādiṣu madhye yasya kasyacinnidhanasya prāptau vidherniyamārthatvāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1182: tādarthya tu phalāntarābhāve 'pi saubharavākyoktavṛṣṭyādiphalasādhane saubhare hīṣādīnāṃ niyamyamānatvādupapadyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1184: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālāvistare dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP28mjnya02u:1188: guṇas tu kratusaṃyogāt karmāntaraṃ prayojayet saṃyogasyāśeṣabhūtvāt / Jaim_2,3.1 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1189: ekasya tu liṅgabhedāt prayojanārtham ucyetaikatvaṃ guṇavākyatvāt / Jaim_2,3.2 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1204: tasmiṃśca yāge bādhyaṃdine savane pṛṣṭhastotre rathaṃtarabṛhajjagannāmakāni sāmāni vikalpena vihitāni /
GSP28mjnya02u:1217: somayāgasya rathaṃtarasāmopetatvapakṣa eteṣu graheṣvaindravāyavaḥ prathamaṃ grahītavyaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1222: tasmāt - aindravāyavādiguṇopetāni karmāntarāṇyatra vidhīyante - iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1223: brūmaḥ-“yadi rathaṃtarasāmā somaḥ syāt“ityukto yaḥ somaśabdaḥ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1226: na ca rathaṃtarādiguṇānuvādena jyotiṣṭomasya vyāvṛttiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1227: tasya prātaḥ savanādau gāyatrādisāmopetatve 'pi pṛṣṭhastotre rathaṃtarādiyogasyāpi sadbhāvāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1234: nanu yaḥ prakṛto jyotiṣṭomaḥ so 'nyeṣāṃ so 'nyeṣāṃ somayāgānāṃ prakṛtiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1236: ata eva daśamādhyāye pañcamapādasya pañcadaśādhikaraṇe prathamavarṇake“yadi jagattāmā“iti vākyoktamāgrayaṇāgratvaṃ vikṛtau viṣuvannāmake mukhye 'hani vyavasthāpitam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1239: kiṃtu 'anyena vihite somayāge yatra jagatsāma saṃbhavati tatra guṇavidhāyakam - ' ityetāvanmātrasyātra pratipādyatvāt // MJaiNyC_2,3.1-3 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1248: vyatyayāya trayāṇāṃ ca rājatvāprāptirasti hi // MJaiNy_2,3.5 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1263: tasyāmeveṣṭau haviṣāṃ kramavyatyayaḥ śrūyate -“yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta,
GSP28mjnya02u:1267: tatra yathā pūrvādhikaraṇe - aindravāyavāgratvaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ yadiśabdayuktena vākyena rathaṃtaraṃ nimittatvenānūditam,
GSP28mjnya02u:1268: evamatrāpi pañcamasthāne śrūyamāṇaṃ bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ madhye tṛtīyasthāne sthāpayituṃ 'yadi rādanyaḥ' ityanuvādaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1269: vaiśvadevasya tu svata eva tṛtīyasthāne śravaṇāttatra madhye nidhānavidhirnityāmuvādaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1270: nanu rājakartṛke rājasūye brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ prāptyabhāvānnānuvādo yuktaḥ- iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1279: tasmāt - aveṣṭau brāhmaṇavaiśyau pūrvamaprāptāvanena vacanena prāpyete /
GSP28mjnya02u:1280: nanu rājasūyasya rājakartṛkatvāttadantargatāyā aveṣṭerapi tathātvāttasyāṃ brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ prāpaṇamayuktam - iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1283: tasmāt - atra brāhmaṇādikartṛkaṃ yathoktaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ karmāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti na rathaṃtarāditulyatvam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1307: anuṣṭhānaprakārajñāpikāṃ vidyāṃ ca vinā karmānuṣṭhānaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1309: vidyā copanayanapūrvakādhyayanamantareṇā saṃbhavantī brāhmaṇādyupanayanaṃ kalpayati - iti tatra prāptiḥ- iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1313: tasmāt - vasantādikālaviśiṣṭe brāhmaṇādikartṛke ādhānopanayane atra vidhīyete // MJaiNyC_2,3.7-9 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1328: guṇo vyutpattiśeṣābhyāmāvṛttyākhyo na nāma tat // MJaiNy_2,3.11 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1341: tathā cā'vṛttyā yuktaḥ prakṛto darśapūrṇamāsātmako yajño dākṣāyaṇayajñaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1347: amāvāsyāyāge dvau dvau dohau saṃpādya catasṛṇāṃ dadhipayasoḥ kumbhīnāṃ saha prasthāpanaṃ sākaṃ prasthāpyaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1349: tathāsati prakṛte darśayāgo paśuphalāya sākaṃprasthāpyākhyo guṇo vidhīyate // MJaiNyC_2,3.10-11 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1352: yāvad uktaṃ vā karmaṇaḥ śrutimūlatvāt / Jaim_2,3.13 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1353: yajatis tu dravyaphalabhoktṛsaṃyogād eteṣāṃ karmasambandhāt / Jaim_2,3.14 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1358: vāyavyaḥ śveta ālabhyo bhūtyai saurye caruṃ tathā /
GSP28mjnya02u:1361: phalārthe athavā yāge viśiṣṭau vihitāviha // MJaiNy_2,3.13 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1374: tasya ca śvetakāṣṭhasya vāyunā spṛśyamānatvādvāyavyatā saṃbhavati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1379: bhūtibrahmavarcase phale ca sarvakāmikayordarśapūrṇamāsayoḥ pūrvasiddhe evānūdyete /
GSP28mjnya02u:1384: tadāpi yāgasyāśravaṇādīlambhanirvāpayoreva śravaṇādyāvaduktakarmavidhiḥ- iti dvitīyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1387: 'bhūtikāmo vāyavyena śvetena paśunā yajeta' 'brahmavarcasakāmaḥ sauryeṇa caruṇā yajeta' ityevaṃvidhor'thasiddho vidhiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1388: dravyadevatāsaṃbandhakalpitasya yāgasya liṅpratyayena kartavyatāvidhāvālambhanirvāpayordhātvarthayoḥ kā gatiḥ- iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1410: saṃyuktas tv arthaśabdena tadarthaḥ śrutisaṃyogāt / Jaim_2,3.18 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1415: yāgaḥ syādupadhānaṃ vā yāgaḥ śeṣoktadaivataḥ // MJaiNy_2,3.17 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1424: upadhānaṃ tu yāgopayuktasya pratipattiḥ sviṣṭakṛdādivat - iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1435: yāgau guṇo vā yāgaḥ syādanvayāvyavadhānataḥ // MJaiNy_2,3.19 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1442: tatra paryagnikṛtaśabdena saṃskṛtapaśudravyasya pātnīvataśabdena patnīvannāmakadevatāsaṃbandhasya ca pratīyamānatvādamaṃ yāgavidhiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1448: iha tvālabhyatvena prakṛtaḥ paśuḥ pātnīvataśabdena pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1449: tamanūdya paryagnikṛtaśabdānvitena 'utsṛjanti' ityākhyātena paryagnikaraṇākhyo guṇo vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1450: na ca prakṛtimatasya paryagnikaraṇasya vikṛtau codakena prāptatvādanarthako 'yaṃ vidhiridhivācyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1466: na cānena nyāyena paryagnikaraṇātprācīnānāmapya prāptiriti vācyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1467: vidhīyamānasya paryāgnikaraṇasya nūtanatve satyupakārakalpanāpattyā prakṛtau yatkḷptopakāraṃ paryagnikaraṇaṃ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1469: prakṛtau ca prācīnāṅganantaramādina evopakāraḥ kḷpta ityatrāpi tādṛśasyaiva vidhānātparyāgnikaraṇāntāṅgarītiḥ sidhyati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1470: evaṃ ca sati 'utsṛjanti' ityākhyātena yathoktaparyagnikaraṇavidhāvarthasiddha uparitanāṅgotsargo dhātunānūdyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1478: tadyāgo vā guṇo yāgaḥ syādadābhyāṃśunāmataḥ // MJaiNy_2,3.22 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1483: yo 'dābhyaṃ gṛhītvā somāya yajate' iti 'parā vā etasyā'yuḥ prāṇa eti,
GSP28mjnya02u:1485: tatra- adābhyaśabdasya jyotirādivadapūrvanāmatvāttannāmako yāgo 'yajate' ityākhyātena vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1488: grahaṇaliṅgena jyotiṣṭomavikṛtitvādagatau tadīyavidhyantātideśena tatsiddheḥ - iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1496: grahaṇaṃ ca jyotiṣṭomagatasya somarasasya saṃskārarūpo guṇaḥ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1501: athavā-taittirīyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhakāṇḍe ṣaṣṭhe prapāṭhake prākaraṇikaṃ viniyojakaṃ vākyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1504: agnis tu liṅgadarśanāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta / Jaim_2,3.21 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1505: dravyaṃ vā syāc codanāyās tadarthatvāt / Jaim_2,3.22 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1506: tatsaṃyogāt kratus tadākhyaḥ syāt tena dharmavidhānāni / Jaim_2,3.23 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1510: agniṃ cinuta ityatra yāgo vā saṃskṛtiyaṃjiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1515: 'ya evaṃ vidvānagniṃ cinute' ityevaṃ vidhāya śrūyate-'athāto 'gnimāgniṣṭomenānuyajati,
GSP28mjnya02u:1525: agnimagniṣṭomenānuyajati' ityatesminvākye 'agniṃ yajati' iti yajisāmānādhikaraṇyāt 'upāṃśu yajati' itivadyāganāmatvam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1529: tasmāt 'agniṃ cinute' ityatrāgnināmako yāga ākhyātena vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1530: cinotistu 'iṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinute' iti vākyaprāptasya cayanasya somayāgavikṛtitvena prāptasya grahasamudāyasyevānuvādaḥ- iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1550: kuṇḍapāyināmayane śrūyate-'upasadbhiścaritvā' 'māsamagnihotraṃ juhoti' 'māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta' iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1551: atra- prāptaṃ nityāgnihotramanūdya māsalakṣaṇo guṇo 'prāptatvādvidhīyate - iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1566: kā tarhi nityāgnihotre guṇavidhiśaṅkā - iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1569_0: tathā sati svataḥsiddhaṃ prakaraṇabhedaṃ nirākṛtya prakaraṇaikyāpādanena guṇaṃ vidhāpayituṃ
GSP28mjnya02u:1569_1: pravṛttasyāgnihotraśabdasya śaktau nirūddhāyāṃ tadavasthaḥ prakaraṇabhedo nityāgnihotrādidaṃ karma bhinatti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1578: paramārthatastvatra prathamatarapratītena prakaraṇabhedena siddhaṃ karmabhedaṃ guṇabheda upodbalayati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1592: atra - iṣṭīnāṃ prakṛtibhūtadarśapūrṇamāsagatamāgneyayāgamanūdya tatra tejaskāmarūpaṃ phalaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1618: kāmyeṣṭikāṇḍapaṭhiteṣu 'aindrāgnamekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapetprajākāmaḥ' ityādiṣvayameva nyāyo draṣṭavyaḥ // MJaiNyC_2,3.28-29 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1620: saṃnidhau tv avibhāgāt phalārthena punaḥ śrutiḥ / Jaim_2,3.26 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1631: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe deśakālanimittānyāmnāyante- 'same yajeta' paurṇamāsyāṃ yajeta' 'yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta' iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1634: sa ca darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ-'śeṣaṃ sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati' iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1639: tatra-prakaraṇino darśādeḥ pūrvavihitasyaivaibhirvākyaiḥ punarvidhāne 'samidho yajati' ityādivadabhyāsādeva karmabhedaḥ - iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1640: brūmaḥ- deśādīnāmavidheyatve 'pi vihitakarmaṇā saha teṣāṃ saṃbandho vidhīyatām /
GSP28mjnya02u:1641: sa ca karmavatpūrve na vihita ityaprāptatvādvidhimarhati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1648: yo 'pi-darśādīnāṃ punarvidhiḥ so 'pi deśādisaṃbandhaṃ vidhātuṃ karmānuvādaḥ - iti na karmabhedamāvahati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1649: samidho 'yajati' ityādau vidheyaguṇāntarābhāvenānuvādāṃsabhavātpunarvidhānaṃ bhedahotuḥ- iti vaiṣamyam // MJaiNyC_2,3.30-32 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1652: avibhāgāt tu karmaṇāṃ dvirukter na vidhīyate / Jaim_2,3.28 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1666: tathā satyāgneyayāgasya darśakāle dviḥprayogaḥ- iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1677: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālavistare dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP28mjnya02u:1683: liṅgadarśanāc ca karmadharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta tatrānarthakam anyat syāt / Jaim_2,4.3 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1684: apavarge ca darśayati kālaś cet karmabhedaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.4 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1687: kartus tu niyamāt kālaśāstraṃ nimittaṃ syāt / Jaim_2,4.7 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1691: yāvajjīvaṃ juhotīti dharmaḥ karmaṇi puṃsi vā /
GSP28mjnya02u:1698: tatkālasaṃbandhaśca prakṛte kāmyāgnihotre pūrvamaprāptatvāt 'juhoti' ityanūdite karmaṇi vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1699: tathā satyasya vākyasya nityaprayogavidhāyakatvābhāvena vākyāntaravihitaḥ kāmyaprayoga eka evāgnihotrasya paryavasyati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1738: liṅgamaviśiṣṭaṃ sarvaśeṣatvān na hi tatra karmacodanā tasmād dvādaśāhasyāhāravyapadeśaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.24 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1739: dravye cācoditatvād vidhīnām avyavasthā syān nirdeśād vyatiṣṭheta tasmān nityānuvādaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.25 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1745: api vā kramasaṃyogād vidhipṛthaktvam ekasyāṃ vyavatiṣṭheta / Jaim_2,4.31 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1746: virodhinā tv asaṃyogād aikakarmye tatsaṃyogād vidhīnāṃ sarvakarmapratyayaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.32 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1752: dṛṣṭaṃ kāṭhakanāmādi bahu bhedasya kāraṇam // MJaiNy_2,4.3 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1768: na hyalpāyuvā manuṣyeṇa sarvaśākhādhyayanapūrvakaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ kartu śakyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1786: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālāvistare dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
